1525880.name: Playne VR
1525880.description:
QUEST 2 IS NOT SUPPORTED

Quest 2 (Virtual Desktop or tethered) is not supported for Playne VR. Please only purchase if you are intending to run this with a Rift/Vive/Index/Reverb headset.

Please also note: You might have to restart your Steam client once downloading the DLC to get the VR option for Playne.

About Playne VR

This DLC brings full VR capabilities to Playne and it's free for everyone who already owns Playne.

Grow a beautiful island with mindfulness. Build a daily of meditation. Explore immersive meditation ambiances.

Running Playne VR

1. Get Playne and then download this DLC.

2. Launch Playne from your Steam Library.
3. You will get an option to play in either flat or VR mode. Select VR.

You must launch Playne from the Steam library to get the VR option.

VR Is in BETA

It's took me over a year to develop the VR port of Playne, but it's still in BETA, so some features might not work as intended. Please reach out to me if you experience any issues and I'll do my best to get things up and running for you.

Getting Support

Discord :
Steam Discussions:
Email: Please check 'Visit Website' link on the right panel
1525880.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 匈牙利语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
